description:
Brand: DB POWERKey features:Gravity sensor functionSensor positiveAutomatic coverage featureLoop recording function　With this Car DVR, you do not worry about evidence anymore if you get
involved in a car crash or car accident. It seamlessly records image, video even
voice once you start your car.Real-time recording for unexpected traffic condition.If there is a crash or accident, who is to take the responsibility? Just let
this smartHD(1280*720)dual camcorder tells you.Dual 2 rotatable lens.Different from most dvrs, this one has two lens. The small assistant lens can
rotate which ensure this dash cam will not miss any hint and shows good IR night
vision.Shooting beautiful scenery during journey.When you drive along, this mini camcorder catches terrific special view
automatically. Come on. No professional camera, no cameraman. All you need to do
is to take this120 wide view anglerecorder with you.Is this only a common vechile recorder? Definitely no.G-sensor function enables this dvr to take important video even in a emergency.Motion Detection. Catch gently tiny movement if the car is scratched which you
may not notice.
title: DB POWER HD 720P X2 Dual Lens Dashboard Car Vehicle Camera Video Recorder DVR G-sensor
